About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Yuun Bum Lim

is from Seattle where he just graduated from University of Washington with a bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Software Engineering. He works as a part time Software Engineer at Rokart, where he designed and developed a server side in Node.js.

He finds the field of software engineering enormously rewarding and he is excited to be a part of it. He strives to write code which is easy to maintain and modify, and he likes making meaningful things and channeling his passions through his work. He's always ready for new development opportunities and have plenty of room up his sleeve for a lot more improvments.

SKILLS: Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, SQL, HTML/CSS, GraphQL, Node.js, React.js, Git, AWS, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL

Education

University of Washington, Bothell

B.S Computer Science and Software Engineering

Cumulative GPA: 3.25 / 4.0

Rokart

Software Engineer

  • Reengineered from a REST API to a GraphQL API to fetch data more efficiently and avoid duplication of server logics resulting in reducing the number of endpoints from 4 to 1
  • Built a secure environment by implementing user authentication and authorization and providing different access rights depending on the user type
  • Maintained the application encapsulated and runnable anywhere with the use of configurable environmental variables
  • Technologies: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, GraphQL
